website_summaries.verdict: An awesome, high-capacity charger by a popular name in the industry. The one to get if you don't want to wait around for long charge times.
pros: can charge 3 devices at once in an amazingly short time
Larger devices such as tablets and laptops charge equally as well as phones
cons: It's expensive, but if you need a serious charger, you may not mind the investment

website_summaries.verdict: Charge your iPhone almost 10 times without having to recharge this Anker once. Small enough to carry in a pocket.
pros: Can charge three electronics at once
You can even use it to charge a laptop
cons: Some complaints that the charging gets slower over time, but you can still get it replaced within 18 months

customer_reviews.title: No longer works
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: A little over a year later and this battery no longer holds a charge. Left it plugged in due an entire day and still only at one light full. For how much it cost I expected more than a year of use. Will be moving onto other brands for my new battery. This battery is amazing. It has saved my life so many times. It can charge my phone and is powerful enough for a Nintendo switch. It is also allowed on airplanes and I've traveled with it multiple times, no issue.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: It broke the day after i couldnt return it. ...
customer_reviews.text: It broke the day after i couldnt return it. I plug the charger into the usb port and refuses to charge but lights up. I had it plugged all night and my phone is dead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plugged in but doesn't charge
customer_reviews.text: Used several different cords and charging methods, it won't charge. The lights blink and look like it's charging but you come back 6-8 hours later and it's still on the same level. Normally Anker has very good products, not sure with this one. There are other reviews saying the same thing. Overall the capacity is great, it's just really difficult to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Super good customer support, life long customer
customer_reviews.text: This battery is great. The solid feel it has let's you know it is quality. I accidentally dropped mine from a table and it took a tiny dent honestly more of a scratch. Anyway charge it over night because it seriously takes forever. Next my first one stopped working for a weird reason and I contacted support and they paid for shipping both ways and sent me a brand new one. Seriously some of the best, personable customer service. I will be only buying my products that are cable and battery related through anker.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon King

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great service!
customer_reviews.text: great product and wonderful service --- the battery pack works fine - but the wall charger wouldn't charge after the first hour or so - wouldn't charge my phone either. I let Anker know, and they had a new wall charger to me in a couple days - no hassles at all, very pleasant to deal with. I, in part, picked this product because others said how good their service was - I can testify!
customer_reviews.author: J. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Great product and excellent service
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit for camping and it has been outstanding. I can usually recharge my phone and a bluetooth speaker 4 or 5 times before the PowerCore needs to be recharged. Since it includes QuickCharge, the PowerCore can be recharged in just a few hours. An update July 2018: The AC charging module started to fail. The flip out AC connector would not stay properly engaged in either the open or closed position. I contacted Anker service and after a brief exchange of information, all via email, they replaced the unit. The entire transaction took less than a week. The replacement unit is a slightly newer design and seems to have a more robust AC connector.
customer_reviews.author: J&P Smith

customer_reviews.title: Stay with the older power banks....this one is junk!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in June 2018.....at first it worked great....charged my Samsung Electronics fast....less than an hour....now, 5 months later, it takes 24 hours to charge my phone....my older Anker power bank still charges my phone in less than a hour. I use the same cord, so I know it's the power bank......so disappointed....$80 wasted....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Portable Nintendo Switch Charger
customer_reviews.text: Must buy for Nintendo Switch owners! A bit on the hefty side, but it packs a lot of juice to warrant the weight. Charges the Switch enough for a couple more cycles without fully depleting, and charges phones at an even faster rate. Very portable in a backpack, purse, or messenger.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Anker Power Core portable charger on Dec 23 2016 and by June 23rd 2017 it stopped charging. Is there anything that can be done? I use it everyday. It started great but, little by little it began to falter. Very displeased at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Ulises Infante

customer_reviews.title: Contents not as described. Missing parts!
customer_reviews.text: The Anker PowerCore+ 26800 was delivered today. It did NOT (as described) include the micro USB cable. I re-read carefully and the product page mentions it is included. I want to get the most out of the included AC charger to the PowerCore+. Is this re-packaged B-stock or something???
customer_reviews.author: John T,

customer_reviews.title: I think this battery is possibly outdated and not producing all the mAh
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, currently using it to recharge my pixel 2 XL and a DJI osmo 2, and sometime my partners phone LG V30. I've had it for about 2 weeks, works great! a little slower charge times as well as recharge times, which brings me to my point, I feel as though the battery doesn't full live up to it's 26800 mAh battery life, at least not how others describe it in their reviews, what I'm thinking is that the battery itself is losing it's ability to hold the charge as well as charge properly. Gonna test the product more and then update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Fyritka

customer_reviews.title: so good..
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good...I've been using in place of my wall charger for the last 5 days or so to judge its capacity. From a full charge, I've charged my phone 2-3 times and the LED indicator only shows one light out of ten down - nine to go. Charging the battery out of the box takes a while but it is really a huge amount of portable juice.
customer_reviews.author: Racer661

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! I'd buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my trip to Beijing and loved it! You cannot go anywhere in China without needing a power doc since cell phones are your life! I found this one to be incredibly compatible to charge both my mac and my phone. I will warn it is pretty big and bulky so it's going to be something you'll want to tote around in your backpack and not your pocket. Pro: Holds a ton of power !!!Fast charge port works amazingly!!!!! Packs a punch Cons: Heavyweight and slightly bulky compared to some sleeker models.
customer_reviews.author: C. Helser

customer_reviews.title: Great Charger
customer_reviews.text: This product is about my 5th or 6th Anker product, and I will continue to purchase their stuff. Ive never had an issue with anything from them which keeps me wanting more from them. This portable charger is amazing and holds many many charges for my phone, and I have actually used this to charge my Macbook Pro as well. If your looking for premium charger with lots of power than this is the product for you!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Green

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Horrible experience with this product. It died just before 60 days
customer_reviews.author: Alfmoren

customer_reviews.title: Only purchased because channel clearance
customer_reviews.text: This was 35% markdown as Anker clears non-PowerIQ 3.0 battery inventory otherwise I would not have purchased it. Monies are better invested in PD chargeable Anker batteries with PowerIQ 3 or newer GanTech. ++ includes Anker QC3 charging wallwart ++ PowerIQ Voltage Boost + the professional molesters at the airport allow this as carry-on + aluminum case + circle of led indicates remaining charge - only one QC3 output port - piddley anker charge cable, unbranded (no stars substracted) - ports are only PowerIQ [1.0] (no stars substracted) MacGyver note: level 8 difficulty changing the interior 18650 cells
customer_reviews.author: 🛡️ veracity 🛡️

customer_reviews.title: ANKER IS THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I both love the Anker products. This is the second one that we bought because it works so well it's unbelievably fast charging. We also have the smaller unit (13400) and it works just as well. I recommend Anker products because they always seem to live up to expectation or better. And my experience with customer service is the best. If there is a problem with this unit they take action and correct the problem with lightning speed.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Trzebiatoeski

customer_reviews.title: Oversized Dead weight !
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of Anker battery packs. I have bought a few as gifts to family as well. I was using one for many years until I got this....as an upgrade. Pros - Anker brand (doesnt work on this product) Cons - Too big, too much time to charge, very poor battery life.. Returned with the amazon return policy itself..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Includes quick charge port!
customer_reviews.text: It holds a lot of power and can charge my phone multiple times (probably 9-10 times) before having to recharge the power bank. It was very convenient for my family's thanksgiving vacation trip. The best part of this thing is that the powerbank includes a quick charge port so it charges the phone to 90% in less than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Fats

customer_reviews.title: stopped charging after 3weeks
customer_reviews.text: what I dislike that I spend $86 dollars on this I never dropped it got it hot/cold or wet kept it in my backpack used it to fully charge my phone and tablet at separate times seems like a common problem with it not charging after a month or so I fully charged the batt pack twice worked great third time would not charge changed outlets even tried my cell phone wall charger nothing I will give Anker another chance maybe I got a dud very disappointed with this pack
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Sanborn

customer_reviews.title: Battery Beast
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a behemoth. It charged my LG G4 from nearly flat to full in about 40 minutes and did it about 9 times over on a single charge. It would normally take about 1 hour on a non-Quick Charge charger. Being slightly below 100 Wh, this battery is well within the Dangerous Goods allowance for airlines and travellers should have no problems bringing this overseas. However, always check with the airlines and bring along the printed copy of the airlines' own regulations with you just in case problems crop up at the gate.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Tan

customer_reviews.title: Was perfect, then went bad, complained, then they sent me a new one.
customer_reviews.text: Easily my favorite external charger (and I've had many) This one, after almost 8 months, started not lasting as long by half at least. I called up Anker to ask what's up, and they said no problem and sent me a brand new one within just a couple days. They didn't even ask for the failing one back. So I do feel compelled to share this good experience with a big company about a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: JapesMacfarlands

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: It's got a lot of juice. I am using it to keep my DJI Mavic Pro (drone) controller charged when using it with Android phone (controller charges the phone when connected). I have charged the Anker once and had about seven drone flights so far and it still has 70% life left. It is pretty big/heavy - feels like a brick - but i put it in my loose shorts front pocket when flying and have not had any issues. I like it shows how much charge is remaining in 10% increments.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Took this to universal studios over the weekend, What a life saver. Charged my phone, my wife's phone and my action camera at the same time. With out this we would not have been able to capture all the moments spent on vacation. I would bot recommend walking around witg it in your pocket, its a bit heavy. I have it in my back back and you can firget it is even there. Will be doing more business with Anker products! -Alex Martin
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Good battery, Bad charger.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice although I's wish it would be Qualcom Quick Charge 4+ compatible. Even with QC3 it takes very long to charge full. (Edit). The charger fried after just 4 full recharges so it maybe had problems right out of the box. I'm charging the battery now with my samsung s6 charger and it's charging much faster. Too bad I didn't try different charger earlier. So the battery is very good but the charger that comes along with it was thrash.
customer_reviews.author: Mikko

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the Nintendo Switch and everything else
customer_reviews.text: I bought this charger to charge my Nintendo switch for long flights and it easily does that! I havent tested how many charges I get but im guessing around 3 or 4 full charges. Its fairly compact, durable, but it is a bit on the heavier side for obvious reasons. Another great feature is the quick charge port which works perfectly with my Galaxy S6. First and best battery charger ive ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kattleman

customer_reviews.title: Purchased May 23rd 2018 - No longer fully charges.
customer_reviews.text: Battery takes 48 hours to chard to 3/4s with plug it came with. All but the last 3 dots will reflect a charge. I have older powercores that still work 3 years later with little issue. Update: Anker support rocks. Refurbished product on the way with no out of pocket. A company that works this fast with a willingness to actually resolve the issue is 5 stars for me.
customer_reviews.author: Zolon Farsane

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My wife used to this phone charger for eight solid days on one charge, I also used it to charge my phone twice during that time. So we got at least 10 full charges out of this, it is absolutely amazing. It’s very large, but that’s OK. I highly suggest you buy a case for it and any other supplies as it will be the last phone charger you have a buyer for at least another 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely massive capacity!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast, just buy it already you wont regret it! It has charged our phones (2 note 8) and consoles (vita/switch) with no problem! My husband is horrible about charging his phone, so it's great to have this massive thing handy while were out to keep everything charged. Side note, had a power outage last week. Just shrugged my shoulders, plugged up my phone and switch, and went about my day. Who needs electricity?!
customer_reviews.author: Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Great for a backpack/purse/bag
customer_reviews.text: Tons of battery life! Rugged metal case. Came with mesh pouch and charger. Charges my devices quickly. While it's admittedly heavy, I don't think there's any way around that. It's about the length of a brick and 1/3 the thickness, so keep in mind this is not really a pocket battery. Great for a backpack/purse/bag.
customer_reviews.author: Cronock

customer_reviews.title: VERY happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: This battery pack gets the job done hands down. I use the IQ port to charge my wife's and my newer iPhones lightning fast and the other two USB ports for my sons electronics (including his iPod which doesn't work with the IQ port). Great for camping, hiking, and travel; high quality and LONG lasting. I'm on my fifth iPhone charge and the indicator is reading 60% capacity remaining on the device.
customer_reviews.author: SPCards

customer_reviews.title: One of the highest compliments I can write about a ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the highest compliments I can write about a product is to call it a beast. This device is a beast. It holds its charge in standby mode for an incredibly long time. On weekend trips, I've often left the standard USB charging adaptor at home, and exclusively use this to power up several phones and tablets over several days. I have two of these, in case of a power outage in my area.
customer_reviews.author: CBZ

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: This battery has saved me so many times! I can care less how bulky this thing is. It’s made everything happen!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Anker supporter for life
customer_reviews.text: Eversince I’ve discovered anker products from car lighter plugs to cables and power banks I’ve never owned any other brands except anker. Their products have exceeded my expectations. Out of all the anker products I’ve owned I’ve only had 1 issue where one of the port on my power bank went bad and anker immediately resolved the issue by sending me a replacement. Great awesome product and even better customer service to back it up, what more could I ask for? I’ve finally found my to go to products for all my electronic needs. You can never go wrong with anker products. Lifetime customer here. Thank you anker.
customer_reviews.author: Luciano Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding portable charger that has enough battery storage to charge multiple devices
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a premium portable charger then the Anker PowerCore+ 26800 is it. I keep it handy for quick charging my mobile devices. The battery has great storage capacity and easy to read LED indicator on the device lets you know when it is time to recharge it. Not exactly the best for traveling due to the size and weight of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: A excellent product Indeed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product over a month and believe me , this is the real deal,I charged this pack over a month ago and still it is showing all the bars for 100% charged, even after charging my cell phone over four times and still it hold a full charge, don't second guess yourself spend the money for a quality product and enjoy the rewards ...
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Another GREAT product from Anker!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last month and love it. Anker makes great products and stands behind them. We use it to charge both Apple and Android products and other portable devices without issues. We have 3 portable chargers and this is the best by far because of how fast it charges. It comes with a nice carrying case and charging supplies. FYI, this charger does have some weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: NITENUR2

customer_reviews.title: Not only is the powercore+ 26800 a great product but their support is also very responsive and ...
customer_reviews.text: Not only is the powercore+ 26800 a great product but their support is also very responsive and knowledgeable. Had an issue with my powercore+ after 8 months (treated it well just the Q charge port stopped working) - had a brand new one in about 3 days (not a refurb) and sent in the old one. It's nice to see companies that treat you well; a rarity these days. I have also purchased several other Anker products that are still working just fine - the cables are top notch and the additional usb chargers (multi-port, etc) all work great. Good company - I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Addicted and never leaving home without it...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I little heavier than I expected but it is perfect for quick charging our devices and I love the face the wall plug is a quick charger as well. This will be a gift for those teenagers that claim their phone died...
customer_reviews.author: Toni Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Overkill in the best way
customer_reviews.text: It is huge and it is heavy, but I'm beginning to believe you may just about be able to jump start a car with it. The fast charging port works very well, and the capacity of this battery is astounding. Works well on phones, tablets, and portable gaming systems like the Switch or the Vita (if you're one of the dozen or so of us who still use it).
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Used it daily for about a year for a GS8 and Samsung tab a and it would last me a week on average. Used it during a recent power outage after it had been sitting neglected on a shelf for almost a year and it still had a full charge.
customer_reviews.author: uncle chopper

customer_reviews.title: This is a great package. I've used this on several trips to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great package. I've used this on several trips to keep all of our electronics topped off (iPhones, iPads, Apple Watches, Kindles, Samsung S6, you name it). When I'm not using the battery pack it's great to have another fast charger around the house, especially one with Qualcomm Quick Charge for our electronics that support them. Pair this up with some Anker PowerLine+ cables and you can't go wrong. I'll probably add the USB-C version of this combo next so I can top off my laptops on the go and charge the compatible iPads / iPhones quicker.
customer_reviews.author: YetAnotherAnonymousReview

customer_reviews.title: Cable provided is not good
customer_reviews.text: Item charges very slowly than advertised. Got item yesterday. Left it charging for 10 hours and it was still not completely charged. Wire provided doesnt seem like prior anker cable wire quality. Was using charger provided with charger Will probably need to use different cable. Very unsual as anker brand is usually very good in their products. Will test it out a few more times before deciding what to do. Fast charging feature is great and good point is not having to charge device often
customer_reviews.author: Candy Pinto

customer_reviews.title: Awesome battery!
customer_reviews.text: I love this battery! Take it to festivals and events where I'll be out and about for 12-16 hours with friends and want to be able to recharge several phones and cameras on the go! Also great for travel... long flights, sailing trips where the boats dont have proper generators, and european hotels/hostels where there's one plug for the room and you need some juice! The quick charger is great as well and works with any fast charge device. Will give your phone about 9 charges.
customer_reviews.author: DJKTenX

customer_reviews.title: World Traveler Best Friend!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! I travel world wide and we all know the struggles of keeping our devices well charged from phones, tablets and headphones or any USB Charged device, this product can handle it. Is a bit heavy, but at 26,600 mA, you have stored power for days.
customer_reviews.author: fnixon

customer_reviews.title: Charging mechanism with way off
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Anker travel battery I used for the road. The first last 6 years I believe. Was excited to get this one. Something is messed up with the charging mechanism since it can be charging all night and only be at 50% after 8 hours. Other times it will take a full charge. It's hit or miss and when you are on the road can be extremely frustrating to not have your daily juice ready to go in the morning. The discharge seems to work fine it just takes an inconsistent charge. Will stay away from Anker batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent charger
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time while traveling (8 months after I got it). I think it’s impressive the ease in charging and connecting to iPhones .... the charge didn’t die off but I couldn’t tell how much charge it had left (?). But I will say it’s a better charger than my friends have it’s big and lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick Charge failure
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I am wondering if anyone else is having this issue. I bought this battery for our trips (we travel a lot), but during one of those trips last week, I tried to use the Quick charge but it will not work. :( I can't return/exchange it cause it is out of the return date. However, the other ports work. -Mayur ————- UPDATED: I love their customer service! They resolved my issue instantly!!! I am buying their products again!!!
customer_reviews.author: MayurP

customer_reviews.title: Looks good too. Anker has some solid products
customer_reviews.text: Lasts quite a while, does have a bit of weight to it. Feels sleek and solid. Looks good too. Anker has some solid products.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for backpacking. I knew it would be heavy from previous reviews, but the charging capabilities are worth it. It does take awhile to charge the Anker back to full, but it charges my devices quickly. I get so many charges from it I can help coworkers charge their phones too which is helpful at my beach job (outside with no outlets). I also got the protective case which works well with it and helps keep cords and wall plugs organized.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome charger
customer_reviews.text: Best charger you will ever use. My only minimal complaint is that the charging port is dual input output so if you want to charge it with your laptop for some reason. You can’t. Also it has a trickle charger feature for smaller devices that may not have amperage protection built in like AirPods for galaxy buds.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher Gilbertson

customer_reviews.title: Mega charger
customer_reviews.text: I can’t get enough of this charger. It is a beast! I use it every day and I can fully charge electronics multiple time before even making a dent in the capacity. If you want a big charger for multiple device this is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan P.

customer_reviews.title: Great capacity, reliable, but on the heavy side compared to other battery options.
customer_reviews.text: Impressive battery; Has done a fine job powering my phone and gps watch, with repeated charges. Compared to the charmast battery this thing is a heavy brick though. Twice the weight of the charmast battery of the same capacity. The thing is. the charmast battery died within 12 hours of first use. This thing has help up through several hikes and still going strong. The extra robustness is worth it. Charges fairly fast with the quick charger. I do wish it could support the newer PD standard as well as QC for future proofing, but right now QC 2.0/3.0 covers my devices fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says. My daughter borrowed my Anker PowerCore 26800 for a trip to the desert with her friend. They were out for 5 days. She said they were able to charge their iPhones (2 of them) 3 times each and their tablet. After all that recharging - the PowerCore still had juice in it to charge more. Yes it's a little large but it beats the heck out of the smaller ones that might give you 1 possibly 2 charges. Spend the money for the piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 0 quick charger that comes with them is also amazing very good quality and I'll likely order a spare ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 2.0 charger before and it lasted me a long time considering I used and dropped it at least 3 times a day on wood floors and concrete every day my only issue came from breaking the USB ports so I guess not slamming cables without looking would avoid such an issue I decided to get the 3.0 and so far it works just at well as the one prior. The 3.0 quick charger that comes with them is also amazing very good quality and I'll likely order a spare or 2 for back up or as gifts
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best customer service. Choose Anker if possible.
customer_reviews.text: I brought the item about a year ago but only write the review now. The 5 stars are for one if not the best customer service department. ( Even better than Razer since Anker doesn’t even require you to ship back the defect unit) I understand while rare manufacturing defect do some time occur the way company respond show their character.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Anker replaced NC
customer_reviews.text: After 14 months of operation my Anker stopped working so contacted Sophia at Anker and she asked for picture of unit and receipt which was on Amazon-she replaced it with a brand new unit-AWESOME Service!! Didn't know it had an 18 month warranty! Thanks Sophia!!
customer_reviews.author: capt mike

customer_reviews.title: an amazing power bank
customer_reviews.text: an amazing power bank!! it takes 8-9 hours to charge..please don't let that put you off. it will last forever it seems. i would use my cell as GPS navigation 6 days a week for 6-8 hours a day and it had no problems keeping my phone 100% charged for a week on a charge(didn't even plug my phone in)!! Sadly somebody stole it and i no longer have it :'( im planning on getting another one..
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Use big power adapter to charge the bank power
customer_reviews.text: Very good everywhere anytime and it charge faster than blueing to the electricity. The only issue when I wanted to charge the power bank it takes longer u need to find (big power adapter like iPad power adapter or tablet power adapter) if you wanna it faster to charge don’t use the adapter that comes with very weak and it takes forever.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Nowhere near as durable as expected
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item 18 months ago and within the first few months, the "quick charge" port just stopped working (battery wasn't dropped or damaged). Then one of the 2 remaining ports started getting flaky and wouldn't consistently charge which left me with a 1-port product for the price of a 3-port product.....I travel a lot and bought this product specifically for the multi-port and quick charge features. The battery life, however, is as expected and charges my iPad pro 2.5 times or my iPhone 8 just over 5 times. I am not going with this manufacturer for my next portable battery purchase due to the unacceptable durability.
customer_reviews.author: OS

customer_reviews.title: I have owned this 24 months...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this. Kept it in my backpack and always knew I could hike as long as I wanted to while studying or listening to books on audible. It just didn't last that long for what it cost. It is finicky now; doesn't refill a charge unless left plugged in for days, and I am using the original charger and cord. Now it isn't even charging a fit bit in one night. So the juice doesn't go in or out reliably. Feeling a little burned. 18 months was the deadline. We have lots of Anker products. Hoping they do better than this one.
customer_reviews.author: MoxieMom

customer_reviews.title: I'm very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: im using Anker PowerCore to charge the power bank all night and all day. it is only halfway charged. I'm very disappointed with product when it comes to changing time. this product is sucks. once the warranty expired, they would not help you . customers service sucks. if your warranty expires, dont even bother to call them. the product is not worth the money when it goes down right after the warranty expiration.
customer_reviews.author: el mehdi

customer_reviews.title: Fast charging, massive capacity
customer_reviews.text: Cons: Big, heavy. Pro: Like carrying a portable powerstation. About 25% of full charge easily kept my iPhone XS Max running for a week while on vacation. I also used it to power my battery operated heated vest during an NFL football game. Running the vest non-stop for the entire game used about have of the charge.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Greene

customer_reviews.title: Flipping Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. Can charge multiple devices at one time 2. Has the capacity to charge multiple devices multiple times! (like phones, ipods, ipads, etc) 3. Holds its charge very very very well!!! (about a month just chilling on a desk, and no noticeable loss in charge) Cons: 1. Little heavy. Not horrible, but a tad cumbersome in weight and size. 2. Takes quite a while to charge, 4+ hours. As expected though its 26,800mAh!! (avg smart phone is about 3,000mAh)
customer_reviews.author: Brian M

customer_reviews.title: Love all anker products only thing I wish they did ...
customer_reviews.text: Love all anker products only thing I wish they did was to make the Charing connection a type c instead of the micro USB but other then that works great
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed & easy to use product.
customer_reviews.text: Buy it, you won’t be disappointed. This thing has got so much juice it that it will power up anything you need multiple times. I like it’s cool looking & easy to read 10 dot power indicator (obviously each dot is 10%). I charged up my completely dead iPhone X and the Anker Power Core+ didn’t even lose 10% of its power, it still had 10 dots.
customer_reviews.author: James K. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Finally a backup charger that I can depend on
customer_reviews.text: Heavy but always there when you need it. Charges phone fast. And many times before it needs recharging. Only downside is that is it slippery. I would suggest wrapping it in friction tape so you dont drop it. It is not the cheapest battery charger, but it is hard to be for quality/value.
customer_reviews.author: G-Man

customer_reviews.title: Great charger! Must have for travelers with multiple devices.
customer_reviews.text: I use this primarily for air travel. I have also used it around the house when my device is low on charge and I need to keep using it. This charger is large and powerful, things I expected when I bought it. Todd is the best charger I’ve ever owned/used.
customer_reviews.author: NAS0314

customer_reviews.title: Good but heavy
customer_reviews.text: Seems really strong but weighed way more than I was anticipating. Actually returned it for a 20,000mh that was 1/4 size and weight. Great product, just I was looking for an EDC pocket carry battery.
customer_reviews.author: RandomNoob

customer_reviews.title: Gold standard in backup batteries
customer_reviews.text: Lasts for days. Kept my phone charged throughout at 10 day scout camp. Solid build, great high power charging brick comes with it to rapidly recharge the battery. If you try to use a standard charger, it will take days. I bought two. Nice carry sack too to keep your cables with the charger.
customer_reviews.author: Will England

customer_reviews.title: Awesome portable charger!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bring this every time we travel. It lasts for up to more than 8 charges (we only use for our iPhones) before we need to charge it again. And you can charge this overnight and it'll be full battery again. Must have if you're a frequent traveller!
customer_reviews.author: lovejoxoxox

customer_reviews.title: Battery!!
customer_reviews.text: Change to my review, Anker sent me a brand new unit after reviewing my comments and I couldn’t complain. New unit charges within 6 hours from dead to full power. Thank you for being such an awesome company and standing by your products. Cheers! Great Product! Only reason I’m giving it 3 stars is because the battery take 2/3 days to fully charge. The first day I got it, it took a solid 14 hours to charge. Continued that until about the 6/7 month mark. Took the device on deployment and was more of a pain because of how long it took to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Reyna

customer_reviews.title: Still works well 6+ months into constant usage. This ...
customer_reviews.text: Still works well 6+ months into constant usage. This keeps my phone and tablet charged for a week of travel, including both flights, without the need to recharge. Also powers a RPi 3 + display (small display - the little ones that are basically the same size as the pi) for a day of usage at least. Using the included charger, I plug it in at night and it's fully charged in the morning. For my fairly simplistic usage patterns, I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Payne

customer_reviews.title: A Super-Loaded Battery for Lots of Use
customer_reviews.text: This portable battery charges an iPhone 6S completely from dead and doesn’t even lose one tic of battery life on the indicator wheel. So far, no glaring issues with it. Charge time is a bit slow, but I usually set it to charge overnight, and it’s ready to go for a whole week of regular on-and-off use. Also came with a neat little fishnet-esque bag to hold other cables with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got  the bad one in the  bunch
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in may2017 ,it worked well ,then one day , one of The charging portals would not charge . The other two worked fine. I called anker and true to their reputation they quickly replaced it.maybe I just got the one bad one in the bunch . I will give then the benefit of the doubt.
customer_reviews.author: DLL

customer_reviews.title: Charges Quickly
customer_reviews.text: The only reason why I rated this product 4/5 is because it is quite heavy and large so I hardly use it because It makes my backpack so much heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: Great for Travel
customer_reviews.text: I mostly use this while traveling, especially on planes. Works great keeping my devices running. It is even capable of charging the Nintendo Swith while playing. I do not have any IQ devices so I am unable to comment on its effectiveness. When you drain the battery, it does take a long time to recharge it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Charged it up fully one time, and I used it to charge my phone day and night for two weeks before I had to charge it again
customer_reviews.author: Ken Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Really sad this time just last 3 months👎
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but this time unfortunately after about 3 months after I bought it I had a problem and it stopped charging and this was my brand, I started with this brand was my first one. I am still using some older models and well bad luck with this 26800mah.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Sepulveda.

customer_reviews.title: Now that I have it, I don't know how I did without it.
customer_reviews.text: At first I was skeptical that this device would just be one more thing I had to remember to charge. But I have discovered that it holds its own charge for a fairly long time. So, it is realistically possible to keep it in my back pack and charge my phone without taking it out of my pack multiple times before needing to charge the device itself.
customer_reviews.author: Plum Parlor

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, don't consider anything else.
customer_reviews.text: I can't praise this power bank enough. It is a monster. I head up one of the main Pokemon go spots in my city and I always have the bank with me in case anybody needs a charge. It charges in about 10 to 15 hours and it holds a lot of power. Build quality is great it came with cool packaging. Really glad I purchased this one instead of anything else. I can't recommend this power bank enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kaminari Paints

customer_reviews.title: Best Battery Pack on the market!
customer_reviews.text: for 80 bucks this thing is awesome for its long battery life, it even says it can last 4 months before its next full charge! (CRAZY!) wish it included a 3rd USB for standard charging and had a 6ft cable for its standard charging unit love that it shows blue led as supporting standard charging on certain devices while its led lights up green for supporting 3.0 Qualcomm charge!
customer_reviews.author: Emanuel

customer_reviews.title: Great backup. Very bulky.
customer_reviews.text: Great back up. Very powerful and will fast charge my s7 Active multiple times very easily. It also handles charging on my Kindle fire. It can be used for multiple charges on that before I have to plug it in also. The only downside is, it's big. Like really big. You're not going to carry this thing in a pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: The rest of the family likes to fight over chargers.  I no longer need to worry about it.
customer_reviews.text: I use this almost every day. The rest of the family likes to fight over chargers. Since buying this Powercore+ I've been able to charge my devices without getting in the middle of the nonsense.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Oliveri

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: I researched external battery packs for a while before making this purchase and it always kept coming back to the Anker powercore 26800. This pack is amazing, I've fully charged my iPhone 7 plus twice now and the indicator has yet to drop a level. One thing to note, I did compare this to the upgraded powercore 26800 and found that the higher price tag on the other version was not worth it. This pack will hopefully be my go to for many trips to come.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Anker PowerCore + 26,800 Died Young: Not Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Bought back in April 2019. Used it occasionally, to charge iPhone Max, no more than 3 times. Now this particular Anker battery pac won’t take a charge. Expensive paper weight. Too late to return it. Not sure a out Anker QC.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas M. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Best for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Best in it class if it own.. I own other battery packs with more juice on them...like aukey an well those lasted less an died before any of my anker poweranks like I mean died to the point where they wont work or change any more often 3 to 5 full charges
customer_reviews.author: hulk_mex

customer_reviews.title: This is a great battery pack that isn't to large
customer_reviews.text: This is a great battery pack that isn't to large, it helped charge my phone and Nintendo Switch and GoPro for a week without dying while I was traveling. It does take some time to Charge the battery when it's dead but overall for it's size it has great power.
customer_reviews.author: Kalopsia

customer_reviews.title: Beast.
customer_reviews.text: This Anker is a beast. Took it on vacation and was quick-charging multiple iphones and ipads every day. Also worked great with my Nintendo Switch but you need to have a USB-C cable handy. It went through TSA without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: A. Upton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Charger
customer_reviews.text: This thing is worth every penny. I swear it charges my phone faster than a wall outlet. It has a huge battery so multiple devices can be charged. I've enjoyed having it with me.
customer_reviews.author: A-Salis

customer_reviews.title: Very happy customer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Man I own Anker products one was good had a little problem with it and the company reached out to fix it! Now with this power core I have to say it is worth the money.. I have charged my S9 two time and my mother iPhone 6 once and it still doesn't need to be recharged it still show ot has a full charge on it! But when I have to recharge it. It only takes like 10 hours. Understand it is big and heavy I keep it in my backpack for school which keeps me from being stuck to a outlet!
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Very, Very Useful and They Really Work
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my computer (MacBook Pro) and iPhone and portable modem going for more than a full day's work. Outstanding performance for a modern "Road Warrior".
customer_reviews.author: Tim King

customer_reviews.title: Mis-rep on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Amazon listed it would be a fast charger for iPhone X. When I called Anker they said “no it isn’t good for that”...to amazons credit, they credited my for the unit. But I am still left without a great charger for my phone. I have lost trust that Amazon will have it, but can’t find Ankers recommendation anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Tim VanDam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent power bank that will charge all your devices for days on a single charge
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do and does it well. Pretty solid build with no sense of cheapness what so ever . It's a little bit big but I knew that buying it. Overall an excellent product and highly recommended. Lasted my entire 9 day trip with a large amount of juice still remaining.
customer_reviews.author: José AlHasan

customer_reviews.title: After a month purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great portable charger but In less than a month it had scratches and stains that were not removable. I’m very disappointed on how long it took for me to get these scratches and stains when I’ve never dropped it. I always keep it in my bag for going to school or work and when I use it I keep it in my bag and charge my phone as I walk with my 6ft cable. The charger doesn’t usually fit in my pocket so I rather just carry it in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Herrera

customer_reviews.title: I love external batteries
customer_reviews.text: I love external batteries, I have one in almost every size. When I saw this, I knew I needed it...not one but three. 'Cause why not? The size is quite large. In fact too large to carry in your pocket, comfortably.is my favorite for carrying around but the thing I like about this one over the 20100 is the quick charge (to recharge the actual external battery) time, in half. If you dont mind the bulkiness, this is the one for you. If you want something that is easier to carry around, get the 20100.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for hurricane season and it work out well. We were without power for 5 days and this charged 2 phones and a radio for all 5 with power left over. Wasn't the cheapest but performed better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Orloldman

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING BATTERY LIFE.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing battery life. The spining charge indicator is cool. Charging two phones and ear buds 5 days a week I charge it every 2 months eventhough it doesn't need it.
customer_reviews.author: William A Lehne JR

customer_reviews.title: Best value for size. Includes awesome charger.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I run two phones full time at 100% for two and a half days sometimes without recharging the battery. And if you use the included 18 Watt IQ Quick Charge 3.0 charger and cable included with this kit it charges in a pretty quick amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Clarkson

customer_reviews.title: Anker Customer Support Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: The PowerCore+ 26800 is a beast! This thing is huge and heavy, but it packs power and keeps your devices charged for awhile. I’ve had this charger for several weeks and recently one of the USB port came undone while using it. Contacted support and explained what happened, within a few days they sent me a brand new replacement. How cool is that? This device is covered under 18 months warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Kribo

product_meta.title: Anker PowerCore+ 26800, Premium Portable Charger, High Capacity 26800mAh External Battery with Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 (in- and Output), Includes PowerPort+ 1 Wall Charger
product_meta.description:
PowerCore+ 26800
The Premium Ultra-High-Capacity Power Bank

From ANKER, America's Leading USB Charging Brand
Faster and safer charging with our advanced technology
50 million+ happy users and counting

Qualcomm Quick Charge
Using Qualcomm's advanced Quick Charge 3.0 technology, the PowerCore+ allows compatible devices to charge 85% faster. Get up to 8 hours of use from just 15 minutes of charging.

Fast-Charging Technology
Exclusive to Anker, PowerIQ and VoltageBoost technologies combine to provide universal full speed charging for non-Quick Charge devices, up to 3 amps per port.

Ultra-High Capacity
PowerCore+ 26800 is one of the world's highest capacity portable charger with Quick Charge 3.0 technology. It charges the iPhone 6 ten times, the Galaxy S6 over seven times or the 2015 MacBook more than three times.

Premium Components
The PowerCore+ 26800 is built with a premium aluminum matte finish and uses only high-grade circuitry and premium LG battery cells.

Worry-Free Warranty
At Anker, we believe in our products. That's why we back them all with an 18-month warranty and provide friendly, easy-to-reach support.

For Optimal Use:
Use the included Micro-USB cable, your original cable or a third-party certified one (such as MFi); AC adapter not included.
Please use your original Apple charging cable (not included) to charge Apple products.
Compatible with most USB-charged devices, including iPhone 8 / X / XS / XS Max / XR (Lightning cable required), Android smartphones and tablets (including the Nexus 7), USB-C MacBooks / iPad (USB A to C cable required).
Does not support Power Delivery fast charging for Apple devices.
Not compatible with the iPod nano, iPod Classic, HP TouchPad, Dell Venue 11 Pro, Moto X 2015, Asus tablets; Not for devices with an input below 50mA (e.g. some...
feature_bullets: The Anker Advantage: Join the 50 million+ powered by America's leading USB charging brand.

Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0: Using Qualcomm's advanced Quick Charge 3.0 technology, PowerCore+ allows compatible devices to charge 85% faster. Recharges itself 2X as fast with the included wall charger.
Fast-Charging Technology: Exclusive to Anker, PowerIQ and VoltageBoost technologies combine to provide universal full speed charging for non-Quick Charge devices, up to 3 amps per port.

Ultra-High Capacity: PowerCore+ 26800 is one of the world's highest capacity portable charger with Quick Charge 3.0 technology. It charges the iPhone 6s 9 times, the Galaxy S6 over seven times or the 2015 MacBook more than three times.
What You Get: Anker PowerCore+ 26800, PowerPort+ 1 with Quick Charge 3.0, Micro USB cable, travel pouch, welcome guide, our 18-month worry-free warranty and friendly customer service.
